description:
SUNSILK CONDITIONER LONGER & STRONGER 700 ML

More bounce, more life, with longer and stronger conditioner! Sunsilk's exclusive conditioner, with Biotin & Sunflower Seed Oil, gives your hair more body and bounce. We make hair products you will enjoy trying, exploring, dreaming and discovering. We'll be honest: today, we have a wider range of possibilities than ever before. Every second is an opportunity to live life to the full. And we want to be beautiful when we do that, don't we? Out here, in the real world, our life is rather hectic, and we need our hair to be beautiful and to stay that way despite all the twists and turns. This is where Sunsilk comes in. Simple, vibrant, full of colour and scents, Sunsilk stands shoulder to shoulder with you every step of the way. In a vibrant and constantly changing world, we can celebrate each challenge with protected, repaired, strong and well-groomed hair. With decades of experience in each bottle, you can count on us to hit the mark in this endeavour. They say you only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough. Welcome to our world, providing hair care for girls who like to experiment, explore, dream and discover. Feel the difference with Sunsilk today!

Long and healthy-looking hair from root to tip

With Biotin & Sunflower Seed Oil for more hair body and bounce

This exclusive conditioner formula gives your hair more body & bounce.

Sunsilk shampoo and conditioner bottles are made with 25% recycled plastic

Paraben & Dye Free for shiny, healthy hair

Ready? Use after every shampoo. HOW TO USEGently massage through to the ends of your hair, then rinse thoroughly.
name: Sunsilk Biotin Conditioner Longer & Stronger 700mL
